content: crochet this gorgeous daisy bag that is composed of 13 granny squares that are seamed together in a special way choose a combination of colors or use just one to customize your own elegant medium-sized bag the free pattern can be found *** here 1 *** note that the 12 page pdf contains the step-by-step pictures and detailed instructions on how to assemble the bag the multi-colored bag uses three different shades of 24/7 cotton i used taupe 2-3 skeins ecru 1 skein and goldenrod 1 skein i used ecru for the single colored version 3 skeins to see different color combinations and for inspiration for your own bag check out my blog post *** here 2 *** as i worked up 22 different granny squares using various shades of 24/7 cotton yarn in my stash i have a full video tutorial on my blog and on youtube that demonstrates how to crochet each and every round of the daisy granny square as well as the straps i also demonstrate how to crochet over the yarn tails and weave in the ends too find this video ** here 3 ** to instantly add zipper closure and compartments you can fit a medium size bag organizer into this bag comes in different colors and patterns you can find the bag organizer link in my blog post 1 https //www allaboutami com/breezy-days-daisy-bag/ 2 https //www allaboutami com/summer-days-daisy-bag/ 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=wqjza5us4ea&t=12s
